subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound||丂|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=wind; air}} – original form of {{och-l|呼|to call; to cry}}. Compare {{och-l|兮}}.
